summary: An Ordinance approving the assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 2039, for the improvement of the South one-half (1/2) of Hanford Street, from Thirty-seventh Avenue South to Cascade Avenue, and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues therein named, all in the City of Seattle, by grading the same and constructing concrete walks and necessary wooden curbs and gutters, and providing for all necessary drainage; under Ordinance No. 20551, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against each parcel and lot of land and part thereof shown in said roll, and providing for the collection thereof.
